metadata.title: USN-4761-1 -- Git vulnerability
metadata.description: Matheus Tavares discovered that Git incorrectly handled delay-capable clean/smudge filters when being used on case-insensitive filesystems. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4761-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  git - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 gitweb - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-all - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-daemon-sysvinit - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-arch - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-el - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 gitk - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-gui - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-mediawiki - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-daemon-run - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-man - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-doc - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-svn - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-cvs - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-core - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 git-email - 1:2.7.4-0ubuntu1.10 No subscription required
